misc.error_extended: An error occurred while fetching data. Please, retry later.

information.terms_of_use_body: This application was developed for the only purpose of providing accessory data regarding the spread of COVID-19. It does not replace nor aims to replace in any way the authorities of competence where it is used.
information.software_as_is: The software is provided "as is", without any kind of warranty, expressed or implied. In no event shall the authors or the copyright holders be held liable for any claim, damages or other liability araising from the direct or indirect use of the software.
information.datasource_body: The data is provided by the Johns Hopkins University for educational and academic research purposes. For additional information please visit
information.no_warranty_datasource: The Johns Hopkins University disclaims any and all representations and warranties, including accuracy, fitness for use and merchantability. Reliance to data for medical guidance or use in commerce is strictly prohibited.
information.datasource_body2: The data shown in the app could differ from that provided by the Johns Hopkins University since processed to provide some features. For any bug or problem please open an issue at the following
information.privacy_policy_body: This application does not save nor process user's data. Althought the third party services could save and process some device information as: model and type, operative system and version, user agent, IP addess and other data. For more details please read the Privacy Policy of the following third party services.
information.github_raw_data: GitHub, Inc. to access raw data.
